Unlimited Local and National calls -- The STV 196 should not be used for any commercial activity. Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for calling 100 unique callers in a week or more than 300 mins in a day or 1200 mins in a week. For any customer found violating any of these conditions, local & national tariff @ Rs 0.30/min will be applicable.

Unlimited I2I Mobile Mins -- Commercial activity will mean customers using the said product for making 100 unique callsin a week,i.e. Maximum limit of 500 mins in a day and 1200 mins in a week.Any customer found calling more than 100 different numbers in a week the pack will be deactivated -- This STV should not be used for any commercial activity.
